name: Python_Visualize-vcd-File
description_zh: 該項目展示了如何使VCD檔更具可讀性。VCD檔是由EDA邏輯模擬工具生成的基於ASCII的轉儲文件格式。用於偵錯FPGA模擬的結果。
description_en: This project is showing how to make .vcd File more readable. VCD File is an ASCII-based format for dumpfiles generated by EDA logic simulation tools. It's used for debugging the result of FPGA simulation.
